import './Portfolio.css' import {Swiper,SwiperSlide} from 'swiper/react' import 'swiper/css' import img1 from '../../img/sidebar.png' import img2 from '../../img/ecommerce.png' import img3 from '../../img/hoc.png' import img4 from '../../img/musicapp.png' import {themeContext} from '../../Context' import {useContext} from 'react' export default function Portfolio() { const theme = useContext(themeContext) const darkMode = theme.state.darkMode; return (
Recent Projects Portfolio
) }
